cancelAllClicked.description:
Defines the name of the cancel all button event click. Fired when cancel all button in summary is clicked. Fired only in multiple upload mode.
Function takes argument evt

fileSelected.description:
Defines the name of the file upload selected event. Fired when file is selected from browse dialog.
Return false in order to cancel uploading file.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file
Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file

fileSelecting.description:
Defines the name of the file upload selecting event. Fired when browse button is pressed.
Return false in order to cancel selecting file.
Function takes argument evt.

fileUploadAborted.description:
Defines the name of the file upload cancel event. Fired when the server responses that the file is canceled.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file
Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file
Use ui.totalSize to get the file size of the uploaded file
Use ui.uploadedBytes to get uploaded bytes
Use ui.fileStatus to get current file status

fileUploaded.description:
Defines the name of the uploaded event. Fired when the file is uploaded
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file
Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file
Use ui.totalSize to get the file size of the uploaded file

fileUploading.description:
Defines the name of the file uploading event. Fired every time when fileuploader get status for the upload.
Return false in order to cancel uploading file.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file
Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file
Use ui.totalSize to get the file size of the uploaded file
Use ui.uploadedBytes to get uploaded bytes
Use ui.fileStatus to get current file status

onError.description:
Defines the name of the file upload error event. Fired when error is occurred.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.errorCode to get current errorCode
Use ui.errorMessage to get detailed error description
Use ui.errorType to get error type - it could be clientside or serverside
Use ui.serverMessage to get specific server message returned by server - if errorType is serverside

allowedExtensions.description: Get or set file allowed file extensions. When this array is empty - it is not made such validation. Example ["gif", "jpg", "bmp"].

autostartupload.description: Get or set whether the file start upload automatically when it is selected. Default is false.

controlId.description: UniqueId of the control - should not be changed by developer. Set from server-side wrapper.

css.description: Get or set control specific CSS options. For example you can override specific control classes with custom ones.

errorMessageAJAXRequestFileSize.description: Get or set error message when AJAX Request to get file size throws error.

errorMessageCancelUpload.description: Get or set error message when ajax call to send cancel upload command.

errorMessageGetFileStatus.description: Get or set error message when ajax call to get file status throws error.

errorMessageMaxFileSizeExceeded.description: Get or set message shown when max file size of the uploaded file exceeds the limit.

errorMessageMaxSimultaneousFiles.description: Get or set error message when maximum simultaneous files is less or equal to 0.

errorMessageMaxUploadedFiles.description: Get or set error message when maximum allowed files exceeded.

errorMessageNoSuchFile.description: Get or set error message when file is not found.

errorMessageOther.description: Get or set error message different from the other messages.

errorMessageTryToRemoveNonExistingFile.description: Get or set error message when trying to remove non existing file.

errorMessageTryToStartNonExistingFile.description: Get or set error message when trying to start non existing file.

errorMessageValidatingFileExtension.description: Get or set error message when file extension validation failed.

fileExtensionIcons.description: Set icon css classes for specified file extension

fileSizeDecimalDisplay.description: The number of digits after the decimal point.

fileSizeMetric.description: Get or set file size metrics how to be shown files size.

height.description: Get or set height of the main container of the file upload control. Main container contains all buttons, progressbar, etc.

labelAddButton.description: Get or set label for browse button in main container.

labelClearAllButton.description: Get or set label for summary Clear all button. It will be shown only in multiple upload mode.

labelHideDetails.description: Get or set label for show/hide details button when main container is shown.

labelProgressBarFileNameContinue.description: Get or set filename when it could not be shown the whole file name and should be shorten.

labelShowDetails.description: Get or set label for show/hide details button when main container is hidden.

labelSummaryProgressBarTemplate.description: Get or set template for showing uploading information in summary progress bar. It will be shown only in multiple upload mode. {0} uploaded filesize. {1} - total file size.

labelSummaryProgressButtonCancel.description: Get or set label for button cancelling all files. Shown only in multiple upload mode.

labelSummaryProgressButtonContinue.description: Get or set label for start upload batch files. Shown only in multiple upload mode and autostartupload is false.

labelSummaryProgressButtonDone.description: Get or set label when upload is finished. Shown only in multiple upload mode.

labelSummaryTemplate.description: Get or set template for showing summary template. {0} is count of uploaded files. {1} is total count of file to be uploaded.

labelUploadButton.description: Get or set label for the first shown browse button. When file is selected for the first time this button is hidden.

maxSimultaneousFilesUploads.description: Get or set count of files that could be uploaded at the same time.

maxUploadedFiles.description: Get or set the maximum number of allowed files to upload.

mode.description: Get or set multiple or single file upload. In single upload it is possible to upload only one file at the same time.

multipleFiles.description: Get or set a bool setting that allows user to select(for upload) more than 1 file from the browse dialog at once. HTML 5+ - it is supported by Chrome, MOzilla FF, Safar, Opera latest versions and IE10+

progressUrl.description: Get or set URL of HTTPHandler to get information about file upload, current size and also to get commands

showFileExtensionIcon.description: Get or set whether to show File Extension icon

uploadUrl.description: Get or set URL for uploading.

width.description: Get or set width of the main container of the file upload control. Main container contains all buttons, progressbar, etc.
